item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I, um, I have this problem. I broke up with my boyfriend, you see. And I'm pretty upset about it, so I wanted to talk to my best friend. [...] The thing is, they're both you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I'm lonely. Why do you think I had to learn to act so independent? I also get mad too quickly, and I hog the covers, and my second toe is longer than my big one. My hair has it's own zip code. Plus, I get certifiably crazy when I've got PMS. You don't love someone because they're perfect. You love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I finally understood what true love meant...love meant that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Just when you think it can't get any worse, it can. And just when you think it can't get any better, it can." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "When you're struggling with something, look at all the people around you and realize that every single person you see is struggling with something, and to them, it's just as hard as what you're going through." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Sometimes you have to be apart from people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Music is a total constant. That's why we have such a strong visceral connection to it, you know? Because a song can take you back instantly to a moment, or a place, or even a person. No matter what else has changed in your or the world, that one song says the same, just like that moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Some things don't last forever, but some things do. Like a good song, or a good book, or a good memory you can take out and unfold in your darkest times, pressing down on the corners and peering in close, hoping you still recognize the person you see there." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's a lot easier to be lost than found. It's the reason we're always searching and rarely discovered--so many locks not enough keys." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is always patient and kind. It is never jealous. Love is never boastful or conceited. It is never rude or selfish. It does not take offense and is not resentful. Love takes no pleasure in other people’s sins, but delights in the truth. It is always ready to excuse, to trust, to hope, and to endure whatever comes." -- Anonymous

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "And so the lion fell in love with the lamb…" he murmured. I looked away, hiding my eyes as I thrilled to the word. "What a stupid lamb," I sighed. "What a sick, masochistic lion." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Goodbye," said the fox. "And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what. - Atticus Finch" -- Harper Lee

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "People worry about kids playing with guns, and teenagers watching violent videos; we are scared that some sort of culture of violence will take them over. Nobody worries about kids listening to thousands - literally thousands - of songs about broken hearts and rejection and pain and misery and loss." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There comes a time in every life when the world gets quiet and the only thing left is your heart." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
Anna-lena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "You should never be surprised when someone treats you with respect, you should expect it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anna-lena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "you have to love something before you can hate it." -- Nicholas Sparks
